title: Can't login to my Account
body: I had my other account but it won't let me login. I had the right user name and password but it wouldn't login for me. I could retrieve my password but i haven't visit my yahoo in a long time so i can't do that. Please help. Account summoner name is SAO Neko don't question it. Restore the password and user name back to the original one please RIOT!   {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Seriously.
I'm here trying my ass off to login and it keeps saying "username or password is incorrect. Please try logging in again" this is the second time I have re-downloaded the game and the problem has not been fixed. Please can someone help me, it's real irritating.
Dude same here for some reason my account won't let me log in and i have exactly typed the correct password for the username and dude i still have this problem.
hi :( i can't log in to my account either :/ idk what is going on.. and yestarday i bought 50 euros of RP :// feelsreallybadman

Since you're unable to access your email associated with your account, you'll want to reach out in a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) so one of our recovery specialists can work with you to sort this out.

If you have any questions, let me know.

i have same issue today, im now on my brother acc... it sais i have entered bad password... that is impossible bcs i use 1 password for my game acounts so i dont forget password from diferent sources( riot, steam, origin, ubisoft...) how is this possible? how can i fix it? i tried to change password from page but e mail never came
